text:

I still get their "You have followed a link to a page that the server can no
longer find." page.
creator: hauser@acm.org

text:
Docs changes don't instantantly appear on the website.  You need to have
a little patience.  But I did just do an update for you, so you can find
it now.

Of course, there are still some other dead links on that page.  Someone
needs to do a really throrough rewrite of the ssl docs.
creator: slive@apache.org
